title: When God Showed up on Easter
itunes:author: Guests: Mark & Jill Savage
itunes:summary:
We've all known a couple who's thought, "Our marriage can't make it." If that's you, John, Greg and Erin will share how they've seen God restore broken marriages, and provide some tips for preventing an affair. Featuring Mark and Jill Savage.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Jill Savage's book "Your Next Steps: What To Do When Your Spouse Is Unfaithful" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2021-10-12?refcd=1171608

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/when-god-showed-up-on-easter/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
